oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Opry Star Spotlight - Roy Acuff, Shot Jackson, and Robert Lunn - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpts from an Opry Star Spotlight radio program featuring interviews with Roy Acuff, Shot Jackson, and Robert Lunn on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.) Interviews conducted by Bill Clayborne.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Charlie Louvin; Joe Maphis; Merle Travis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Weather report (Bill Clayborne) -- Opening theme -- Bill Clayborne introduces Roy Acuff -- Roy Acuff talks about being busy since visiting Germany and his respect for Bill Clayborne within the country music community -- Roy Acuff talks about Shot Jackson and Robert Lunn and their comedic qualities -- Bill Clayborne talks about Acuff's exhibit opening -- Roy Acuff talks about his exhibit opening -- Bill Clayborne talks about Jimmy Thompson's fiddle, the first fiddle on the Opry -- Roy Acuff talks about the fiddle going in the exhibit and sun bonnets in the exhibit -- Roy Acuff talks about his process for finding artifacts for his exhibit -- Roy Acuff tells a story about his tour in Germany, seeing the courts of justice, and stealing a drinking glass and an ashtray from the court room -- Bill Clayborne talks about the dolls in Acuff's exhibit -- Roy Acuff talks about collecting dolls from different countries and that he has lost count of all the countries he's visited -- Roy Acuff talks about doing Christmas shows overseas -- Roy Acuff talks about finding artifacts in Dunbar cave (Clarksville, Tenn.) and its opening -- Bill Clayborne introduces Charlie Louvin -- See The Big Man Cry (Charlie Louvin) [record excerpt] (incomplete) -- Harvey's Record department commercial (Bill Clayborne) -- Bill Clayborne talks about Acuff, Jackson, and Lunn -- Robert Lunn talks about practical jokes -- Roy Acuff talks about his early career and tells a story about Robert Lunn -- Robert Lunn tells a story from visiting Italy -- Roy Acuff talks about how to communicate with local people in foreign countries -- Roy Acuff talks about meeting Robert Lunn -- Shot Jackson talks about working with Roy Acuff -- Roy Acuff talks about meeting Shot Jackson -- Roy Acuff talks about Jackson's abilities -- Roy Acuff talks about Jimmy Williams -- Bill Clayborne plugs Opry Star Spotlight -- Roy Acuff tells a story about naming his group (Crazy Tennesseans) and tells a story about playing a show early in his career -- Bill Clayborne talks about selling his families piano to Roy Acuff -- Bill Clayborne introduces Merle Travis and Joe Maphis -- [Unidentified guitar tune] (Merle Travis and Joe Maphis) [record excerpt] (incomplete) -- Bill Clayborne talks (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Acuff, Roy, 1903-1992; Jackson, Shot; Lunn, Robert;
